content.detailedDescription:
Do you remember seeing the reports in the news about a ufo seen over several states, maybe a week or a week and a half ago? 

my kids called me on the phone one night, telling me that they saw something that looked like the objects that was reported, but they told be about two days before it came out on the news. i asked them is they recorded it, they said no...I guess they were caught in the excitement of it all. 

they told me that they saw the same object again last friday (09/23/11) between 10:55 and 11:00pm in they same vicinity from were they saw it the first time.  they said that the object was hovering on top of houses, in a neighborhood across from were they saw it the first time. 

they couldn't make out the shape of the object, it seemed to blend in with they night sky, but it had two or three��� large light and a small blinking red light (i���m getting this from three different perspectives) the driver and two other teenagers. the two large light s were beaming straight ahead...My daughter stated that you could see the two large beams coming from the lights. they actually followed the ufo into the neighborhood, but when they tried to get their cameras ready to record it ...It flew away, in a matter of a second it was a dot far away in the distance.
content.summary: Two to three large white lights that were beaming straight ahead, and one red blnking light.

content.detailedDescription: I had just pulled up to my boyfriends house and looked up to the night sky as i usually do because i love stars. i noticed something that looked like a a star formation but i eventually realized it was moving. there was a diagonal line of blinking lights and infront of it was a > shape. these blinking lights started moving all around eachother. i called my boyfriend to come outside as soon as i realized this and eventually everyone from inside the house came outside to witness the crazy objects in the sky. my feelings were pure amazement but my boyfriend started to get freaked out. the objects continued moving across the sky in different patterns until they were no longer visible. i also tried to capture this on my phone but nothing showed up but the night sky. after i felt very confused but still amazed at what i saw.
content.summary: Orbs in diagonal line like 7 of them and 5 in a triangular form started moving all over making different shapes and eventually diassapeared

content.altitude: Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I had been driving, southeast to northwest, home after a trip to the store when seeing a bright orb like or sphere like light fly nearly overhead in a manner of about 2 seconds from horizon to horizon, traveling slightly more south to north than i.  it may have had a slight "egg" shape, although i believe that effect was just the speed of travel visually "stretching" whatever it was i witnessed.  the first thing that got my attention was the speed, size and brightness.  i don't believe i thought of anything other than a feeling of curiosity, my instinct was to follow but there was no chance.  the night had been foggy/hazy in early evening. by 9:33pm visibility had increased to one of the clearest views of the milky way ever seen from this area... very rare within itself.  we have an airport about 6 miles due south, my first thought was the rotational beacon shining on an otherwise transparent fog bank but this was far too intense and had zero curvature to it's path.  the closest metaphorical description would be the clarity, brightness and contrast of a full moon, without crater contrast within, and a slightly more "yellow" hue(red shift?), using the "at arms length size comparison"(finger, knuckle, fist,etc.).  with little to no way to judge distance and the speed at which the object traveled, it could have been at tree top elevation up to a couple 1000ft. or so.  intuition tells me it's in the range of 100-1000ft elevation, otherwise speeds would be absolutely unprecedented for anything with significant mass.  with several hundred hours observing the night sky, i have ruled out nearly every natural phenomenon from meteorite to known man made craft. there has been an influx of military presence in the sky the past week or so, but there should have been a sonic boom, which is unlawful here without direct order, yet there was none.  i have witnessed night time and day time supersonic flight at multiple elevations, this was much, much faster in my opinion and had no exterior lighting other than the item itself which appeared to be "made of light".
content.summary: Supersonic yet silent flyby, nearly overhead

content.detailedDescription: On september 21st 2011, around 10:30pm, i was driving home to gaylord from work in cheboygan on n. straits highway. i was passing through the town of topinabee when i saw strange lights just above the treetops, ahead and to my left. i slowed then stopped to get a better look. i saw a dull looking metallic object with a rectangular shape. it had 8 blueish-white lights arranged in 2 rows. it also had 1 dominant red light at the front of one of the long sides. it just hovered above the trees, no movement, no sound. after observing this for a short time i became scared when i realized that this object was not any type of conventional craft.  i drove away at a higher than normal rate of speed and lost sight of the object. the next day as i drove to work during the day, i looked for the object or anything it could have been. i saw no lights, no buildings, only trees. nothing that could explain what i saw.
content.summary: Nighttime ufo sighting above trees near topinabee, michigan

content.detailedDescription: My wife has been watching this thing off and on for two weeks. in the night sky it looks like a star with wings that changes colors.But last night we took digital pictures and we were blown away. it looks like a galactic ebani, changing colors and shapes and ejecting objects. it was facing true east. then we noticed a second object almost exactly like the first one in the direction northeast. they both pulsated different colors to the naked eye, and took on whole new shapes and colors when we took pictures of them. we also caught some shots of other objects we couldn't see with our eyes at all. they showed up in the photos after the fact. the objects were still in the sky when we went back in. we felt we had documented them as best we could.
content.summary: My wife actually seen it first. she has been seeing it for weeks. it looks almost like a star until you take a photo of it then looks like ebani in space.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking toward my house from across the street and looking up at a light in the sky that i thought was a commercial airline comming my way from the north. i have been looking up at the sky in that direction because an exact occurance of what i am now relating happened once before in july. the object (just a spec of light at first) grew much larger as it came nearer but did not have the shape of an aircraft- just a red- orange "fireball" appearance(even when viewed through binculars) there was no sound as it followed a straight course to the south. at its closest point, it seemed to be less than 1 mile away and was the size of a streetlight about 1 block away. as before, it was followed by 3 similar objects that appeared at the same point near the northern horizon and moved on the same course.These objects kept the same approx distance from each other(maybe a third of a mile). when the first of these 4 got closest to me, 1 half mile overhead and just south of my location, it seemed to increase speed and change direction. it then  travelled straight up and disapeared. each obect repeated this same course and each disapeared moving upward. when the similar incident occured in july, the objects moved in the same course but they were closer to where i was standing. both of these incidents happened right over the delaware bay shoreline.
content.summary: I witnessed 4 objects appearing to be fireballs but moving like aircraft

content.detailedDescription:
On friday, september 23, 2011, my girlfriend and i were staying in a hotel in west palm for  holiday. i had actually stepped out to smoke and looked up at the sky. i also did remember seeing a brief moment of lightening but it was just a one streak caught out of the color of my eye. s i saw the most "whitest" cloud i had ever seen and it freaky thing was at the bottom where a cloud is usually "curvy/billowy" this cloud was squared on the left side ( like it was cut out with a level). there was lights reflecting out of it. at first i thought it was one of those things that nightclubs do then i realized there was no way. i knocked on the hotel door got my friend out and she saw it too. there was no lights coming from the ground and the lights in the clouds were a white "rainbow" color. they actually appeared to be "dancing"..Anyway. i honestly kept thinking i was making too much of it, i must of missed the outside influence.Etc..Though i must mention both she and i both appeared to have an almost physical reaction on viewing. later on, neither of us admitted to fear but we both seemed to feel an almost "joyful" feeling..
i was actually ready to chalk this up to something, and i had to be somewhere so we left. as we drove up the highway. this cloud was next to us. there was no logical explanation on how it could be doing this and it was not stationary at all. it was there from the hotel where we were staying
 until we drove on to i believe i-95, it was gone, like it never existed.
i have never seen a cloud like that ever. i do not drink,. she was not drinking and we were not high. i do not know what i saw.
content.summary: Strange cloud/lights/west palm

content.detailedDescription:
it was above my neighbors house just hovering about 100 ft up.It was a round disc that was about 25 ft wide that had all different color lights around it. it also beamed a light upwards. for about 15 minutes everyone was trying to take a picture and no ones cell phone cameras worked. some people thought it was the end of the world and started praying. 

 all of a sudden it zoomed away at an incredible speed. before it zoomed away the clouds swirled around the ufo. also it did not make any noise 

this was in kahului on one st. about 50 or more people saw this.
content.summary: Round disc that was about 25 ft wide hovering about 100 ft up beamed a light upwards no ones cell phone cameras worked the clouds swirled around the ufo

content.detailedDescription: We were at lake erie fishing at about 1:30am when i observed ing the sky with my fiance 1 object that appeared to look like a star in the sky changing colors but it started to move very fast but in a weird path turning and changing direction very quickand i started to get worried so i told my fiance lets pack up because i have never seen nothing like it in my 25 years of living. i looked around and i seen 3 of the a little distanve away. they changed colors and went lighter and dimmer at moments but the were moving about in the sky as if they were studying something. we sat and watched them for about an hour and they would appear and disappear and reappear. im just worried that something is going to happen with these things in the sky.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Plusating at times but 3 in the sky changing direction very quick

content.detailedDescription: Dogs had to poo,so walked around the block,waiting for the business,i looked up���iced all the stars,crystal clear,calm night. cleaned up the mess&glaced up to see a star move from right to left&back quick. not a lot,but enough to make me go "hmmm" headed home,grabed blackberry&took pick,but not good one,so i dug out the binoculars&watched it do some strange things. seemed to move away,then move back. car drove past&i seemed to change from green to orange&dim quick.That is when i set the binoculars on the fence to steady&took photo{attached}through the right eye peace. 2:13am,let's go see if still there. yep,and it is doing some freaky stuff,neigbors are even out taking photos.Went back out to get vid,2:23am but clouds suddenly rolled in&it is headed up,so it is what it is&what that is,don't know.
content.summary: Walking the dogs,looked up&wtf is that?

content.detailedDescription:
I checked out at wal-mart at 22:39 and walked out and i remember thninking that it was way too early to have christmas lights out but there they were a dull red, crimson red, really red in the shape of a huge letter h on the mountain between myself and home. i was curious because they didn't look right so i took a different way home that would put me closer to the lights. when i got on the street the car in front of me had spotted the lights and was driving very slowly as was i. i topped a hill and saw some cars coming up behind me at a high rate of speed. there were three police cars running flat out. they may have been going 100 mph or faster headed in my direction which was south. the "object" was moving a little to the left and a little to the right as if it were looing for something and suddenly (and i do mean very suddenly) it took off to the south at an unbelieveable speed and was gone. the police cars had gone over the hill. when it took off i noticed i could see lights on the hill that i could not see before. that's how i estimated the altitude. this thing was huge. the police cars were running silent and without their emergency lights on. i am not 100% positive they were chasing it but fayetteville was fairly quiet tonight. i got home and called my son who had seen something in the sky in bentonville headed south that was curious but theoretically explainable because he was farther away than i was. he saw it from the side and i saw it from directly below.

     that's it. this thing was really really huge and incredibly fast and in the shape of (of all things) a capital letter "h".
content.summary: A huge letter h in blood red lights

content.detailedDescription: I just recently moved back out into the country on 80 acres of field. ranch to be exact. as i was laying in bed looking out the window i noticed a very bright light in the sky at first thought it was a planet maybe but than colors starting changing from blue to green to white like flickering or it was spinning. than noticed it was not up in the sky alone another object almost identical but it had more of a orange glowing orb. they were hovering like moving up and down very quickly. i thought maybe my eyes playing tricks on me so i put these objects in my sight and indeed they were the ones moving in such a strange way and so quick. than one crossed in front of the other i thought they would hit eachother but instead i witnessed a reflection of light from one onto the other at a very strange angle. these were no planes. next i witnessed the fire like ball move very fast downwards toward the tree line across the field like it was going to land or crash. it hit the tresses and vanished. as for the other objects slowly dimmed faded lights but continued to move up and down and back and forth right in front of my eye. i should have taken photos there were no other lights out its very dark out here. i was just in awwww over what i was witnessing. the next morning on the news people said they saw meteorite oh than it was a fireball or blaze...All i knew than was i wasn't the only one who saw this. but what they were...? i believe ufo
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Two fire ball blaze orbs hovering in sky, moving up and down as if they were helicopters, but there was no sound. eventually both crossed paths and i could see a reflection of light off the other object.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were on i-65 n, after going to see a movie, we were headed home from rivergate. we were on two mile pkwy (rivergate pkwy)entry ramp to the interstate and after we topped the hill that is where we observed a rectangular shaped object hovering almost directly above the tyson plant. i can only assume it was rectangular in shape from the lights. the lights on 2 corners were white and blue/green flashing in color. the lights on the other 2 corners were a purplish/orange white. it was huge. my husband observed it, however he was driving. we drove past it and it sat there. didn't move an inch. i turned in my seat and still watched it sit there, until we past millersville exit ramp and topped the hill on the other side. i could not believe what i saw... it had to have been the length of a commercial jet and i know that other people had to have seen it as well. the lighting on the ground below it and from the cars on 65-s made it impossible to make out any more details. i just wish that we could have stopped and observed it better but we had to get home to my brother who was on the phone with me at the time. i had cellphone interference as well.
content.summary: Huge rectangular shape

content.detailedDescription:
On thursday september 23rd 2010 at 7:30 pm in the evening, our backpacking group of eight was encamped near alum camp on the gila river.  it was a very clear night with virtually no cloud cover and the moon had not risen enough above the mountains to shine down into the gila river valley.  we had just completed dinner and had begun cleaning up the mess gear.  everyone was sitting around the fire talking like people usually do on such occasions.  after cleaning up the dishes, i walked out away from the fire, past my tent and found a nice place to urinate before i went back to join the crowd by the fire.  i was facing downriver from our location looking down the river valley.  as i stood there relieving myself, i noticed a bright light, much larger than a star and considerably brighter begin descending from the sky straight down into the river valley.  it dropped steadily lower until it was below the mountain ridge line towering over the river valley and was now silhouetted with the river valley cliffs above it.  it was then i was certain i was looking at a possible ufo.  at this juncture, i hollered at my trail companions and they all came out to where i was standing to observe the phenomena.  we all watched the craft noiselessly descend to treetop level, jink back and forth a few times, then turn on a light on the bottom of the object's hull which was aimed below the craft into the trees below.  presently, the object appeared to hover and then settled down below the treeline at which point we lost visual sight of the object.  entire incident from the moment of initial observation to conclusion was maybe 15-20 minutes in elapsed time.  

we tried to videotape the craft and only got a single clear view of the object on the video footage --the point where the craft put the light beam down into the forest.  everyone  including the cameraman was pretty agitated and the camera moves around a goodly bit which is disruptive of the overall view of the ufo.  however, after carefully examining the film footage at length, i could easily make out a known mountain ridge's appearance directly behind the object.  i was then able to guesstimate the distance from our vantage point to the object as approximately 1 1/2 miles distance downriver from our campsite.
content.summary: Ufo landing in gila wilderness near murdock's hole on gila river

content.detailedDescription: While star-gazing i notice what appears as a star but drifts back n forth, and around n around, travels about 1-2" ( viewing from the ground to the atmosphere, distance n speed must be great )then repositions itself. i thot my eyes may have been playing tricks on me so i planted my head against the exterior wall of my home to keep my head from swaying any. the object was indeed moving. swaying back n forth, changing direction instantly. object has appeared in the sky for the last week or so...Ive been checking every nite and it continues to show....Dont have a camera or scope...If anyone reads this close with the proper tools please try to get zoomed video/scope pics etc...I would love to see whatever it is up close....
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo over jax fl. for about 5 nights straight

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving along highway 51 just south of elizabeth, pa at approximately 8:57 p.M on september 24, 2001.  we noticed many (40+) orange orbs exactly as described in the below hyperlink.
http://www.Examiner.Com/ufo-in-national/multiple-orange-lights-move-unison-over-pennsylvania
we exited off hwy 51 at w. newton road where we were continued along rainbow run rd for approximately 1 mile until a clearly appeared.  we stopped along side of the road where we were one of about 7 cars parked viewing the same thing.  no one had a clue of what it could be.  no sound. nothing. just orange orbs.  once we stopped and watched for about 2 minutes, they moved in a horizontal direction. at this point we had only could view about 10 orbs with all the tree cover.  after about 2 minutes that just disappeared.  not much fading or anything. we then proceeded back towards the highway where we pulled off for about 5 minutes at the entrance ramp to hwy 51 off of rainbow run rd.  from that vantage point after about the first 2 minutes about 5 orange orbs reappeared. they too disappeared after about 1 minute.  again, after about another minute 2 more orange orbs reappeared for a third time.  these two orbs were present for about 1 minute.  they seemed to join into one light as they "fly" away.  then they disappeared, never to reappear.  i called the pittsburgh international airport to see what they had on radar, and they reported that the supervisor had nothing and no other reports.  i also contacted the pittsburgh post gazette to report the story.  they too had no other reports. to sum this up, just saw many (40+) orange orbs that appeared to hover until we got as close as you could were they then moved horizontally.  they disappeared and reappeared 3 separate times.  no explanation as to what it could be.  most bizarre thing i have ever seen.
content.summary: 40+ orange orbs appeared hovering at a distance.  once we got closer they moved horizontal.

content.detailedDescription:
Walking outside in backyard.  i am always outside observing the stars in the evening; i noticed lights blinking in the sky and the object unmoving. at first observance i thought it may be a helicopter or airplane.  when i continued to watch it and had my wife come out with my binoculars we noticed that it remained stationary.  we continued to watch the object and called several friends on the cell phone and they also observed the object and kept watching it even as the clouds covered it in our area.  

the object has a white background with a line of four red lights in the center with 4 additional red lights above and trailing.  the total observation time for us was approximatey 45 minutes to an hour.  at that time our friends continued to observe it as the clouds came in our area.
content.summary: Object in western sky above our house with blinking lights and not moving.

content.detailedDescription:
I got up a little after 1am, i went out the south side of my house.
i looked to the east sky and saw a orange color flame like object coming from the east going west,it came almost right over me just a little south of me, than another in about 30 seconds looked just like the first.
than 4 more close together. than about 30 seconds 1 more than about 30 seconds 1 more. all in all i saw around 20 objects all looked alike all flying in the same flight path, and spaced the same distance from one another other than the 4 that were close together. 
picture looks like a round ball, but to the unaided eye they looked more cigar shaped
content.summary: I got up a little after 1am.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to the drive thru down the street from my house when i noticed a minivan in the high school parking lot (east high school)and a man and his children were looking up at the night sky almost straight up.I thought nothing of it that maybe they were just start gazing or something.When i pulled into the holland oil at the bottom of seiberling street i noticed a man standing in the parking lot staring up into the sky as well,so my curiosity got the better of me and i parked my jeep and got out and looked up and saw a round red object that had a circular shape but the cirumfrence was made up of squiggly lines and it was also flickering and pulsating like that of a twinkling star but,this was definately not a star or an airplane or helicopter of that i am certain.We watched it for approximately 4-5 minutes together and then a large cloud rolled overhead and blocked our view of it.I just looked at the guy and said "creeeepy" and he replied "your not lyin".I'm not one to believe in aliens or ufo's but this thing was wierd and it wasn't something that was just burning up in our atmosphere because i've witnessed that happening before so i know what it looks like.In the late 80's i saw a comet or meteor burning up in our atmosphere in the night sky in canton ohio.
content.summary: Witnessed a circular red object with a squiggly line making up the cirumfrence

content.detailedDescription: At first thought it was a firework but it did not dim,explode or drop towards the ground, i was sb on durango moving btwn 45 and 50 mph, it never swereved or moved from side to side but could not distinguish anything inside the light it was so bright, whne i held my thumb up it was bigger then my thumb and not very high in the sky. kept waiting for it to blink or flash as i was thinking maybe a helicopter but the light was quite steady. i realized is was moving to the south faster then i was as it was slowly going down towars my horizon which was starting to be cluttered with buildings and trees. by the time i got to an area with a good line of sight of most of the valley it was gone
content.summary: Very brught bright red light just appeared in the sky as seen thru my drivers side window

content.detailedDescription: I saw what looked like a satellite going over but it was brighter than the normal ones i had seen and bigger. it was moving at a fast rate of speed from south to north in a straight line. i then saw another object that i thought was a satellite but not as bright and smaller moving from north to south in a straight line but slower. all this is w/in minutes. i then saw two objects, one behind the other not too bright and very far up going from north to south. even w/binoculars i could not get the shape or tell what it was. they all appeared to be rotating. i then saw two more very high up going from ne to sw, again following one another. the last one i saw again looked like a satellite i see once in a blue moon where i live going over. i followed it with my binoculars and all of a sudden it flashed a huge bright light aspirin size and it scared me for i thought it was coming down towards me. i took the binoculars away and the light was still on and then it went off and i continued to follow it from north to south out of sight when it went over my house. it seemed to stall and stay stationary as the bright light came on. the light was white and very bright like looking into the high beam of a headlight on an automobile. it was almost blinding. my neck hurt so from looking up in 10min i had to come in but will go back out later and look. i have no way of taking night pictures or night video for with my digital camera they do not show up that far away. i do live in the country with no street lights and it is very dark and the night was clear so i have an excellent viewing area. i hope to get a telescope when i can afford it! this is my account of what happened.
content.summary: Saw w/in 10min 7 objects moving s to n & n to s, one e to w very fast, some slow, one behind the other, one flashed bright light & then it went off.

content.detailedDescription: I went for a walk down my street and had just been looking up in the sky in the direction of west and all over the mostly clear sky, when i looked back again westwardly and saw a black object in the sky which at first i thought was a big bird.  but when the object remained stationary, hovering and "shapeshifting" or maybe wobbling, i knew it was not a bird.  it was not a plane, nor a helicopter, nor a balloon.  there was no noise.  at one point, during a duration of around 4 minutes, the sun reflected off the right side.  it's shape at first was round, but then it was an odd shape.  when it took off in a north west direction, it became flat, like a disc.  it did not move off rapidly, but it didn't take long to be out of sight.  i tried to take a picture with my phone camera, but i mistakenly forgot to save the shot.  don't know if i even got the object in my view finder. i believed it to be a ufo as i watched it with one other person.  i was excited to have seen it, as i have seen two other ufo's in my lifetime, one with this same person.
content.summary: Black hovering shapeshifting object daytime sighting

content.detailedDescription: My father was in the bathroom and he noticed something in the soap holder, he looked closer and he found a odd shaped object that was stuck on the soap. it appeared dead and so my father put it in a little baggie. after some researching it has a striking resemblance to rods.
content.summary: May have physical evidence of rods

content.detailedDescription: On september 8th, 2011 during the blackout that covered san diego county, i went out the front door several times to observe.  the night was clear and cool, only a few stars were visible, really great night.  across the the street a neighbor had a portable generator runnung.  he was the only visible house with lights on.  i recall hearing and seeing a helicopter circling in the area.  at one point, maybe aound 6-7 pm i went outside and noticed an object with red, green, and white lights hoving straight out from my house.  the helicpoter was gone.  the object's shape was difficlut to tell because of the lights. it did appear to be a vertical diamond shape with the top flatter than the bottom.  it moved slightly up and down and horizontally, but essentially stayed in the same spot.  my first thought was that it was an airplane because i had seen a distant airplane about this time.  the airplane i observed/heard moved away and soon disappeared.  the object hovered in the same area.  it appeared to be about 1-2 miles to the east and about 500-1500 feet above the ground.  i thought several times, of getting my camera, but for an unexplained reason i did not.  i have no photo record. the object was in the same place for at lease 4 hours.  i wnet outside several times and saw it.  as best i can recall this is my first ufo sighting.
content.summary: Observed at night about 1-2 miles away

content.detailedDescription:
i was at work on the car sales lot and noticed there were a number of jet contrails overhead so i decided to take a few photos of the jet just to see if i could identify it. 
 i downloaded the phtograpghs to my computer and when i opened the images i could see a very small object out in front and above the jet. there was also a evry tiny dot behind and above the jet.
 when you zoom in on the photo you can clearly see a huge disc shaped object above and in front of the jet and you also will se a smaller disc shaped object flying on an angle behind and above the jet, almost in line with the disc out front. 
 i was totally shocked and surprised to see these two objects in the photogragh and all my coworkers were just as surprised as i was. what are these discs doing here? who is piloting these objects and why are they flying along withan unmarked jet spewing contrails or chemtrails?
 i went outside again about a half hour later to phtograph another one of these jets and to my amazement there is an unidentified object behind and above that jet as well. it's a different shape almost looks wedge or arrow shaped but about the same size as the jet in the photo.
 don't know what's going on here but it is pretty curious! these jet pilots had to have known these objects were there, especially the first one as the disc out front and above is as big if not bigger than the jet itself! 
 i get the distinct feeling that we are being lied to and not in any small way either! the government knows a heck of a lot more than they are saying! these objects seem to me to be working in unison with these jets. and justr what exactly is in those contrails? there had to have been at least tywenty ot more of these flights over our skies here yesterday. all at about the same altitude but on different flight paths and all spewing these large contrails. it seems to be happening on pretty much a regular daily basis lately. i will definitely be taking more photos of these jets just to see how common this phenomenon of other unidentified objects along with them is! 
  i could not see the objects with my bare eyes and it was not untill i downloaded the images to my computer that i could see the objects. i have not edited the photos in any way, they are just as they came from my camera. i wish i had a good zoom lens for the camera but unfortunately i can't afford one at the moment. i was using my cannon eos rebel xsi camera with an 18-55mm lens zoomed in as far as possible and using the image stabilizer mode on automatic camera settings.
 i have attached the two photographs, unedited and also a third with the two objects circled ( a copy of the first photo) you may not see the objects very well at first as the jet and the objects were flying at a very high altitude and quite a distance from where i was standing, but just blow the photos up a small amount and it becomes quite apparent. when you really zoom in on the front disc in the first photo you can clearly see that it is a disc shape and has shadow on the bottom and is sunlit on the top. and you can also see the back disc is lit from the sun on the front edge while the back is in shadow. it is on it's side following behind and above the jet. you can also see that these jets seem to have no external markings of any kind. none on the fuselage and none on the tail or the wings that i can see. just plain white jets spewing plain white contrails. but it's these discs that truly have me wondering!
content.summary: Disc shape as large as jet in photogragh taken with smaller disc behind

content.detailedDescription: I happened to look up and see this grey object moving at a very high velocity. it crossed the entire sky in just 7 seconds and i could tell it was extremely high in the atmosphere.
content.summary: Very very,fast.

content.detailedDescription: I walked out of my shop at exactly 6:20 am and noticed a very large plane flying across the sky east to west just south of bozeman, as i was observing the plane i noticed what i thought was a typical satellite flying across the sky from south to north and west of bozeman when suddenly it stopped for a moment and then changed direction from west to east. this object/light appeared to be in space or very far away soon after it changed direction i lost sight of it. at almost the same moment that i lost sight of the small satellite like object i noticed a very large bright star like object moving from the s. west to the n. east coming straight towards me. this thing was very large and silent, the lights did not flash and i could not notice any kind of strobe as i was trying to identify it as a possible giant plane. the object flew right over my head and continued towards the n. east and never changed direction, it moved at a very steady speed, it appeared to be pretty high in the sky but, it was lower then some of the clouds i was expecting to lose sight of it as it approached some clouds but, it was lower then them and i continued to watch it until it was just to far away to see. when the object was very far away but, still barley visible a jet did take off west to east from gallatin field. now for the kicker! this morning 9/24/11 at exactly the same time 6:20 am my wife observed an object very similar to what i saw yesterday only she saw it making zig zags and changing altitude right over bozeman she observed this for several minutes.She came to wake me and when we rushed out to look it was gone. i did not have my phone on me when i made my observation therefor i have no pics or video.
content.summary: Looked like a very bright star or planet only it moved!

content.detailedDescription: I was at st. helen's church in newbury, ohio on 9/24/2011 playing bingo. at approximately 8 pm i went outside with a group of people for a cigarette break. a lady that was standing next to me noticed 3 lights in the sky over the lake across the street that formed a perfect v-shape. we thought at first that it might be a tower, but realized the lights were not blinking. we watched this for about a minute and then it just faded out!
content.summary: V-shaped with 3 distinct lights

content.detailedDescription: It was a warm night in july,and i couldn't sleep so i decided to go outside and look into the sky without my video camera.I saw in the distance a pulsating white light that danced in the sky,i ran back in the house and immediately grabbed my video camera and started to film the object in the sky.I honestly thought that this object was very weird looking because it kept dancing in the sky,i could figure it out.But the real party was just getting started,all of a sudden a bright incredible disc shape object danced into my video so close that it was scary.I knew than that what i filming what not from earth,i almost felt that they knew that i was filming them.The object moved at such high speed in my camera lens,that i was so stunned.Local channel 9 video bought my tape,and the reporter that'' you have something incredible''.Even when i called them up,they thought i was filming a plane or it was fake,until they saw my video.They new than that what i had was so real and downright scary.  i please need to get this video watched by professional ufo investigators. i am going to get this video preserved to dvd.
content.summary: Ufo light up simi valley in july

content.detailedDescription: I was at home and had gone outside to get something from my vehicle. i glanced up and saw what first appeared to be a star. i noticed it was kind of flashing . so i made note of where it was in the sky and ran inside to get my wife and my telescope. i sat and observed  the object for roughly fifteen to twenty minutes . during this time my wife and i noticed that it was not only flashing but it was moving as well . short small movements from left to right and also up and down . we did not notice the movement of the object until we observedit through the scope . the evidence of the changing colors was also great through the scope . i have been a star gazer my whole life and have never witnessed anything like this. this is not the first occurance of these objects in the night sky around here . i was also witness to one several months ago back in january. it kept me mesmerized for five and half hours i even called the police department to report that one. they thought i was some nut or drug addict i'm sure .
content.summary: Bright blue red and white light blinlimg in the night sky appears at first like it is a star
